Audio.name: Music Volume
Audio.description: Adjusts the volume of background music.

Audio.name: SFX Volume
Audio.description: Adjusts the volume of sound effects.

Audio.name: Master Volume
Audio.trollDescription: Determines how loud The Master from Beat Saber OST 7 should speak.

Audio.name: Audio Offset
Audio.description: Adjusts the audio offset (in milliseconds) for gameplay.

Audio.name: Remove Pitch Compensation
Audio.description: Makes it so that song speed affects pitch.

Video.name: Toggle Fullscreen
Video.description: Toggles between fullscreen (on) and windowed (off) mode. Alternatively, you can use Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen.

Video.name: Screen Resolution
Video.description: Changes the screen resolution. Using one of the first two options is a must for the best experience.
Video.trollDescription: Modifies your monitor's New Year's Resolution.
Video.warning: Changing this option might break some text elements due to TurboWarp issues!
options: Match display size (not recommended except in fullscreen)

Video.name: Framerate Limit
Video.description: Limits the frame rate of the game (gameplay only). Setting it to 0 is basically unlimited but not recommended.

Graphics & Performance.name: High-Quality Pen
Graphics & Performance.description: Turns on high-quality pen for better pen rendering (not recommended).
Graphics & Performance.warning: Turning on this option might break some background elements and cause even more lag due to TurboWarp issues!

Menus & Interface.name: Menu Theme
Menus & Interface.description: Changes the theme of certain menus.

Menus & Interface.name: Menu Color Scheme
Menus & Interface.description: Changes the color scheme of certain menus.

Menus & Interface.name: Background Visibility
Menus & Interface.description: Sets the visibility of the background when certain menus (like this one) are visible.

Menus & Interface.name: Preview Video
Menus & Interface.description: Plays a preview of the song's video in the background on the song selection screen (if the song has one).

Miscellanous.name: FPS Counter
Miscellanous.description: Displays the current frames per second (FPS) on-screen.
Miscellanous.trollDescription: Displays a low-quality (regardless of set quality) JPEG image of Emperor FPS from the UTTP.

Miscellanous.name: Troll Messages
Miscellanous.description: Displays random troll messages throughout the game for fun.
Miscellanous.trollDescription: Seeing weird messages? Try disabling this option! üòú

Miscellanous.name: Language
Miscellanous.description: Changes the language of the game.
Miscellanous.warning: Changing the language settings will not change anything at the moment because this game is still in beta and I would like to wait until it's actually finished to make support for other languages instead of constantly going back and forth. Thank you for understanding.

Experimental.name: Reflections
Experimental.description: This feature is unfinished and is not recommended.
